name: Raptor Invasion
description:
Play as the little blue dinosaur to fight against raptor empire in the epic journey for the sake of your extinction family. Are you strong enough to defeat RaptorJesus?!!

Please use Full Screen to play, there is a problem about screen size (it is pivot problem for unity).

(This game is for education purpose, I earn nothing from this game.)

Also, please do this form after finish playing it.

https://forms.gle/LkbE3HpqrJfWVSvQA
